title: Strengthening of the coordination of emergency humanitarian assistance of the United Nations
text:
United Nations 
A/80/L.33
 
 
General Assembly 
Distr.: Limited 
8 December 2025 
Original: English 
 
25-20154 (E)    091225     
*2520154* 
 
 
Eightieth session 
Agenda item 72 (a) 
Strengthening of the coordination of humanitarian 
and disaster relief assistance of the United Nations, 
including special economic assistance: strengthening 
of the coordination of emergency humanitarian 
assistance of the United Nations 
 
 
 
United States of America:* amendment to draft resolution A/80/L.25 
 
 
Strengthening of the coordination of emergency humanitarian 
assistance of the United Nations  
 
 
 
After operative paragraph 70, insert the following operative paragraph: 
 
Stresses that there is no international right to an abortion and that humanitarian 
response efforts of the United Nations system for maternal health and family planning 
should include every attempt to eliminate the need for abortion and should provide 
women with the best possible family planning, maternal healthcare, psychological 
support and other essential support services; 
 
 
 
* Any changes to the list of sponsors will be reflected in the official record of the meeting.
